Crimes.Legal_Issue: Did the RPD's credibility and subjective fear findings meet the reasonableness standard?

Crimes.Cause_of_Refusal: Lack of credible evidence of persecution or subjective fear

Crimes.Crime_Name: Failure to claim refugee status in Trinidad or the U.S.
Crimes.Violation_Type: Failure to seek protection in safe third countries

Crimes.Defendant_Behavior: Delayed claim, inconsistent statements, marriage of convenience
Crimes.Grounds_for_Claim: Alleged persecution in country of origin
Crimes.Assessment_Factor: Opportunity to claim protection in prior countries
Crimes.Credibility_Assessment: Negative credibility due to delay and inconsistencies

Crimes.Evidence_Assessed: Consistency of narrative, timing of claim
Crimes.Evidentiary_Deficiency: Lack of explanation for failure to claim earlier
Crimes.Cause_Description: Failure to claim refugee status in safe transit countries undermines credibility
Crimes.Evidence_Handling: Some medical evidence overlooked but not decisive
Crimes.Misrepresentation_Element: Implied lack of genuine fear due to delay
Crimes.Decision_Rationale: Delay and opportunity to claim elsewhere weaken claim
